columnDefinition.name: NetFxNativeImage
columnDefinition.description: The primary key, a non-localized token.

columnDefinition.name: File_
columnDefinition.description: The assembly for which a native image will be generated.

columnDefinition.name: Priority
columnDefinition.description: The priority for generating this native image: 0 is syncronous, 1-3 represent various levels of queued generation.

columnDefinition.name: Attributes
columnDefinition.description: Integer containing bit flags representing native image attributes.

columnDefinition.name: File_Application
columnDefinition.description: The application which loads this assembly.

columnDefinition.name: Directory_ApplicationBase
columnDefinition.description: The directory containing the application which loads this assembly.
